item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].npcType == 1158) { // Kqueen if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4753) { slayer2 = true; } else { sendMessage( "You need a veracs helm to attack the KQ!"); } }

item.source: Cant do a command unless you have full veracs

item.title: Cant do a command unless you have full veracs
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Ok I have the tele thing working now, have any idea on how to make it so they cant attack the kq unless they have full veracs? This is the code I whipped up as a start and it did not work.

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].npcType == 1158) { // Kqueen if (playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4753) { } else { sendMessage( "You need a veracs helm to attack the KQ!"); } }

Thats just for the v helm for now, and it still let me atk the kq without it.

I put it under:

if (server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].npcType == 1605) { if (playerLevel[18] >= 84) { slayer2 = true; } else { slayer2 = false; sendMessage( "You need a slayer level of 85 to slay Aberrant Spectors."); } }

There has to be something simple im missing :\

Read full topic
item.source: Cant do a command unless you have full veracs

item.title: Cant do a command unless you have full veracs
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

I’m just pulling this up right here since i dont have my files with me.

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kqueen")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Chassy } else if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == XXXX) || (playerEquipment[playerLegs] == XXXX) || (playerEquipment[playerBody] == XXXX) || (playerEquipment[playerHat] == XXXX)){ teleportToX = 3485; teleportToY = 9483; sendMessage("You teleport to the kalphite area."); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has decided to try and slay the Kalphite Uqeen!"; } else { sendMessage("You need to be wearing full veracs to fight the KQueen. }

not sure if your playerEquipment labels are the same as mine so you might have to change those.

Read full topic

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kqueen")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Chassy } else { teleportToX = 3485; teleportToY = 9483; sendMessage("You teleport to the kalphite area."); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has decided to try and slay the Kalphite Uqeen!"; }
